about_the_game:
Good Worker by Rooster Village is a chaotic and fast-paced FPS that follows the story of Jake, a construction worker who finally loses control after years of harsh working conditions, low wages, and relentless harassment. Armed with everything from construction tools to deadly firearms, Jake goes on an unstoppable rampage across construction sites, offices, and even the streets, determined to exact revenge on his boss and everyone else in his way.

Key Features

🏗️ Unique Weapons and Tools: Use hammers, drills, chisels, and even concrete mixers to unleash mayhem on your enemies.

🔥 Fast-Paced Action: Experience quick and intense combat that pushes you to stay on your toes. The more efficiently you eliminate enemies, the further you can progress.

🕹️ Story Mode & Arena Mode & Escape Mode: Dive into a twisted storyline in Story Mode. Test your survival skills in Arena Mode, where waves of enemies keep coming. Escape from buildings by eliminating the ones in your way.

💀 Gritty Humor: Good Worker combines brutal combat with dark, humorous moments.

🏢 Level Variety and Environmental Kills: Knock enemies off ledges, drop heavy equipment, or even use nearby objects to your advantage.

🔧 Low-Poly Graphics with Realistic Lighting: Enjoy a unique aesthetic with vibrant lighting and shadows, while ragdoll physics brings a humorous touch to enemy deaths.

Gameplay

In Good Worker, you're encouraged to unleash chaos at every opportunity. As Jake, you’ll use a wide variety of construction tools and firearms to fight your way through hordes of enemies. Each tool offers different attack styles, from melee to ranged, allowing you to experiment with creative ways to eliminate your foes. The game’s ragdoll physics and exaggerated animations add a playful element, while its intense pacing ensures the action never slows down.

Game Modes

Story Mode: Follow Jake’s journey from being a hardworking, overexploited worker to a vengeful force. Navigate through levels filled with enemies and discover new weapons and tactics along the way.

Arena Mode: Test your survival skills in an endless mode where enemies come at you in increasingly challenging waves. Collect weapons scattered across the map and see how long you can last!

Escape Mode: Fight your way out of a hostile building before time runs out! Enemies will do everything to stop you. Stay sharp, move fast, and escape at all costs!

Are You Ready to Join the Madness?

Good Worker offers a thrilling FPS experience filled with over-the-top action and a darkly comedic storyline. Fight your way through a gritty world, wield unexpected weapons, and channel your inner rage against those who’ve wronged you.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood and violence.

short_description: Good Worker is a fast-paced FPS game where you play as Jake, a construction worker pushed to his limits. After years of low pay and daily harassment, Jake snaps and takes revenge on everyone in his path. Prepare for an intense journey through chaotic levels, unique weapons, and absurd scenarios!
